image.title: Xiaomi 13 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V14.0.8.0.TMACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Ultra China

Codename: ishtar

Version: V14.0.8.0.TMACNXM | 13.0

Size: 8.7 GB

MD5: 872f3abee8d368c2764a74836ae0781f

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Meet Xiaomi 13 Ultra!
Capture the moment. Explore Leica imaging.
This latest update will improve the overall device experience, boost system stability, and increase image quality.
[Camera]
Optimization: Image quality for specific scenes
The default zoom rate for Quick snap mode changed to 1.5X
Focal length options for Quick snap mode changed to 0.6m/1.2m/5m
[MI Wallet]
Optimization: Transit card functionality for various locations

Download: Here
